      • getCertificateForType

        byte[] getCertificateForType​(java.lang.String type)
        Retrieves the certificate for the specified type. The certificate is validated against the stored hash.
        Parameters:
        type - The type
        Returns:

      • getCertificateForType

        byte[] getCertificateForType​(java.lang.String type,
                             boolean validateHash)
        Retrieves the certificate for the specified type.
        Parameters:
        type - The type
        validateHash - If true, the certificate is validated against the stored hash. If the validation check fails, null is returned even if the certificate is in the database
        Returns:

      • saveCertificateForType

        void saveCertificateForType​(java.lang.String type,
                            byte[] certificate)
        Saves the certificate with the given type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the certificate
        certificate - the certificate as a byte[]

                                      java.lang.String server)
        Retrieves the certificate for the specified type for the specified server. The certificate is validated against the stored hash.
        Parameters:
        type - The type
        server - The server
        Returns:

      • getCertificateForTypeAndServerAndPort

        byte[] getCertificateForTypeAndServerAndPort​(java.lang.String type,
                                             java.lang.String server,
                                             int port)
        Gets the certificate based off of the given type and server and port and optionally validate the hash of the certificate retrieved from the database
        Parameters:
        type - the certificate type
        server - the server
        port - the port
        Returns:
        Null if not exists, the certificate as a byte[] otherwise.

      • getCertificateForTypeAndServer

        byte[] getCertificateForTypeAndServer​(java.lang.String type,
                                      java.lang.String server,
                                      boolean validateHash)
        Retrieves the certificate for the specified type for the specified server.
        Parameters:
        type - The type
        server - The server
        validateHash - If true, the certificate is validated against the stored hash. If the validation check fails, null is returned even if the certificate is in the database
        Returns:

      • deleteCertificateForTypeAndServer

        Deletes all certificates of the given type and server within the server_certificates table only.
        Parameters:

        server - the server to be removed.

      • deleteCertificateForTypeAndServerAndPort

        boolean deleteCertificateForTypeAndServerAndPort​(java.lang.String type,
                                                 java.lang.String server,
                                                 int port)
        Deletes all certificates of the given type and server and port within the server_certificates table only.
        Parameters:
        type - the type to be removed.
        server - the server to be removed.
        port - the port server to be removed.
